title: [Griffin's Keen, Ruby Point]
description: To the north, the DragonSpine Mountains march off into the distance, their moonlit white grandeur providing a breathtaking backdrop for the climb.  By contrast, the peak just across the valley looks less inviting, topped as it is with jagged black outcroppings of stone.

To the north, the DragonSpine Mountains march off into the distance, their blue-white grandeur providing a breathtaking backdrop for the climb.  By contrast, the peak just across the valley looks less inviting, topped as it is with jagged black outcroppings of stone.
